name: Snow Ball Fight
description:
This game is going to take a "snow-ball" approach to the FPS genre. 

Right  now the current version of the game is only a prototype and multiplayer only works through LAN (you can also use Hamachi or a related program to link IP's). The prototype is being worked on everyday.

This is our first multiplayer game at Pongo Games and I hope that we get lots of suggestions and positive feedback. Our team is made up of 3 people. We all work on the game but our main roles are Joshua Bradley as Lead Designer and Artist, Shemar Mahase as Programmer, and Brian Soto as a Sound, Art, and Level Designer.

This game was inspired from the stunning visuals of the snow maps in the Frost Bite engine derived by EA's Battlefield V.
